nodes.excerpt:
A small project to create a rudimentary nameserver that can handle basic
requests, written in python

A 3 hour coding project: design an algorithm to, given some training data set,
guess what rating will be given to a review based on the contents of the
review and the person reviewing it.

A simple project incorporating many web APIs to find and repair mp3 metadata.
Simply drag and drop your damaged mp3 on the website and mp-complete will fix
it for you.

A tool to query and display the output for glookup, a program to view grades
used at UC Berkeley.

This was a project for the 2011 Facebook hackathon. The goal was to
create a simulation involving multiple agents working towards a common goal
of collecting enough food to survive to the next generation.
